title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: the secret of the ooze (Captioned)
creator_credit: Michael Pressman, David Chan, Kim Dawson, Thomas K. Gray, Gary Propper and Golden Harvest
brief_description: The four hip superheroes Raphael, Leonardo, Michaelangelo and Donatello continue their bodacious adventures as they find a new sewer home and with the help of curvaceous TV reporter April O’Neil, Professor Jordon and Keno, the pizza delivery boy they battle the Foot gang and other mutant villains to discover their origins, to save New York and to keep the mutant-causing green ooze from falling into evil hands.
